title: Cannot login all of a sudden
body:
Hello, all of a sudden I cannot login into my account anymore. Client says my account is currently disabled and that I should contact support
BUT when i try to login it just says my user/pass combination is not good, BUT that is impossible!

I am using this other account so that I am able to write this. I am so confused right now. What's happening?

I asked for an account deletion for this account that I am writing from. Then I made a new account using the same email that this one has. Did the account deletion get mixed up somehow?

replies.body: You'll want to make sure you're using the username for the correct account, the other one slated for deletion would be disabled pending removal.  Hit up our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we can help get you on the correct account.
Everything got sorted out. Thanks. Please go ahead and close this
